content: **knitted blueberry and strawberry hat in drops karisma superwash size 0/6 month 8 years ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ size 0/6 months 1 2/4 5/6 7/8 years to fit head circumference approx 42-45-48-50-52 cm * blueberry hat materials drops karisma superwash from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g for all sizes colour no 07 corn blue 50 for all sizes colour no 47 dark olive * strawberry hat materials drops karisma superwash from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g for all sizes colour no 18 red 50 for all sizes colour no 47 dark olive drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm + size 2 mm for the top knitting gauge 22 sts x 30 row on needle size 3 5 mm in stocking sts = 10 x 10 cm
